"Welcome to my donation application."
"

My name is Amir Zaidi and I am a student at Delft, University of Technology, in the Netherlands." "I hope you have been enjoying the applications I make." "Everything I do is open source so others can continue my work, and make even better apps." "All of this is free for both developers and users."
"

Here is a list of my Android-related projects" "
- Rootless Pixel Launcher" "
- Rootless Pixel Bridge" "
- Google Icons" "
- Material FX" "
- Adaptive Stune" "
- Dynamica Live Wallpaper" "
- DNG Processor" "
- Night Camera" "
- Ozone Essentials" "
- Audio Streamer" "
- Assist Mapper"
"

Now I, as everyone else, have only a limited amount of time." "You can support me and my development journey by donating to me with the orange button above." "Every gift will be remembered, and put to use on new applications in the future."
"

If you wish to contact me, it is very easy to reach me outside of school hours." "Click on the three dots in the top right corner of the screen." "There you can select either Telegram or E-mail as the means to reach me." "I do not read my e-mails often, so if you have something urgent I recommend using Telegram."
"

Thanks for reading my story!" "
Amir Zaidi"
